Get the reverse complement of a DNA or RNA sequence.

Source: R/reverse_complement.R
reverseComplement.Rd

Get the reverse complement of a DNA or RNA sequence.

Usage

reverseComplement(
  x,
  content = c("dna", "rna"),
  case = c("lower", "upper", "as is")
)

Arguments

x

A character vector of DNA or RNA sequences.

content

c("dna", "rna") The type of sequence to be reversed.

case

c("lower", "upper", "as is") The case of the output sequence.

Details

This file is part of the source code for SPGS: an R package for identifying statistical patterns in genomic sequences.
